About

Author

Sivuyile Nzimeni

Published

August 7, 2022

Twitter Github LinkedIn

Sivuyile Nzimeni is a Data Analyst in the Faculty of Economic and Management Sciences, University of the Free State.

Experience

August 2022 - Present | Data Analyst| Office of the Dean: Faculty of Economic and Management Sciences| University of the Free State

Nov 2020 - July 2022| Data Analyst; Teaching and Learning Coordinator | Centre for Teaching and Learning & Faculty of Economic and Management Sciences| University of the Free State

Jan 2018 - Nov 2020| Teaching and Learning Coordinator: Economic and Management Sciences | Centre for Teaching and Learning | University of the Free State

Jan 2017 - Dec 2017| Research Assistant | Department of Business Management | University of the Free State

Jul 2017 - Nov 2017| Part-Time Lecturer |Department of Business Management| University of the Free State

Nov 2015 - Nov 2016| Intern | Office of the Dean: Economic and Management Sciences |University of the Free State

Education

2016| University of the Free State |B.Com Honours with specialisation in Entrepreneurial Management

2015| University of the Free State |B.A with majors in Business Management and Philosophy

Interests

  1. R Programming
  2. Data Analysis in Higher Education
  3. Management Studies
  4. Economics
  5. Social Media Analysis
  6. Natural Language Processing

Publications

Nzimeni, S. Mofokeng, M. 2022. ‘Automating tutorial attendance register capturing, preliminary results from a pilot project’. Siyaphumelela 2022: A Saide Project. Online, 25 - 27 June 2022.

Muller, A. Nzimeni, S. Janse van Vuuren, Corlia. 2021. ‘Curriculum enhancement: reflections on the use of data, holistic student support and disciplinary skills development on a decade-long transformative journey’. 2021 University of the Free State Annual Teaching and Learning Conference.
